Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in the Heart of the City of Fairlawn on the main artery, SR 18, near Summit Mall. Easy access to numerous other services, hotels and restaurants. Although outside of the Parkway, this sister building of 49,560 RSF offers access to all the amenities available to being in the Embassy Portfolio. Premier exterior building signage option for an anchor tenant, street front monument signage for larger tenants.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Signage opportunities
Ideal for small business owners needing a single office
Rent includes all utilities and in-suite cleaning
Suite H: 500 RSF

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Serene setting with easy access to I-77 on the Fairlawn/Copley border. East of the intersection of S. Cleveland Massillon Rd on Ridgewood Road ‚Äì across the street from the Stark & Knoll building.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Professional office building in park-like atmosphere

Outstanding long-term sublease opportunity in Fairlawn. The Innovation Center was built in 2008 and is part of the Contitech Building Complex of 97,845 SF. This complex offers first class surroundings and a prestigious address.

+ Entire third floor of 14,429 SF with private side entrance to suite
+ Fully furnished suite with private offices, conference rooms, cubicles, break room and training rooms
+ High ceilings, expansive window line and free surface parking
+ Easy access to highways and close proximity to Montrose retail, restaurant and services
+ Access to freight elevator
+ Key card access
+ Lease Rate: $18 per SF FSG

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 34,000 SF with mix of open space, conference rooms and private offices
High ceilings, lots of natural light and upgraded finishes
Site consists of 4.62 acres with 149 car parking spaces and walking trails
Fairlawn Gig offers high speed internet
Economic job growth incentives coordinated through City of Fairlawn
Lease is structured as Triple Net and Master Lease expires 2034
Estimated availability early Summer 2021

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
City of Fairlawn Community Facts

Centrally located and accessible to the skilled workforce of the NE Ohio Region and nearly half of all U.S. Households are within an 8 hour drive

Within a 3 mile radius of Fairlawn, 78.6% of residents have college experience with 2.1% holding doctorate degrees, 14.6% master degrees and 31.2% bachelor degrees

Close proximity to Cleveland Hopkins International Airport and Akron-Canton Airport

Ability to collaborate regionally with economic partners to create job growth incentives

Fairlawn Corporate Park area includes over 50 restaurants and approximately 500 hotel rooms within a 10 minute drive

Close proximity to Cleveland Clinic, University Hospitals, Summa Health System and Akron General

Summit County area is ground zero for the polymer science industry, and Fairlawn Corporate Park is located within a 17 minute drive of The University of Akron

Proximity to the University of Akron makes ready access for world class education and research facilities

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Exquisite contemporary single-tenant office building ideal for Corporate Headquarters. Available for a long term sublease in Fairlawn Corporate Park at intersection of Ridgewood Road and South Cleveland Massillon Roads. Built in 2013 it is the former home of A. Schulman/LyondellBasell.
